it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.model.game

Interface Game

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameImpl, GameRigged, MockGame, MockGame

    public interface Game
    A running game of Adrenaline

      • getMap

        Map getMap()
        Returns the Map object representing the map used in this game.

      • setKillTrackListener

      • getPlayerFromColor

        Player getPlayerFromColor(PlayerColor color)
        Returns the player object corresponding to the given player color. If no player is associated to the given color for this game, then null is returned.

      • getPlayers

        java.util.List<Player> getPlayers()
        Returns a list of players, starting from the first player and in the order they should play.

      • isInFrenzy

        boolean isInFrenzy()
        Returns whether the game turned into frenzy mode.

        Returns whether the game should go in frenzy mode.
